quotes.quote: I don't believe in guilt, I believe in living on impulse as long as you never intentionally hurt another person, and don't judge people in your life. I think you should live completely free.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: A guilty conscience needs no accuser.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Guilt is a rope that wears thin.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: If all the world hated you and believed you wicked, while your own conscience approved of you and absolved you from guilt, you would not be without friends.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote:
Peace visits not the guilty mind.
(Nemo Malus Felix)
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Guilt is anger directed at ourselves--at what we did or did not do.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: Many people weigh the guilt they will feel against the pleasure of the forbidden action they want to take.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: When they call the roll in the Senate, the Senators do not know whether to answer 'Present' or 'Not guilty.'
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Nothing is more wretched than the mind of a man conscious of guilt.
quotes.author: Titus Maccius Plautus

quotes.quote: Glory built on selfish principles is shame and guilt.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote:
So full of artless jealousy is guilt,
It spills itself in fearing to be spilt.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Suspicion always haunts the guilty mind.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Suspicion always haunts the guilty mind; the thief doth fear each bush an officer.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare
